revised_title: Electrical Experiments and Observations on Repulsive Forces
tldr: The author conducts a series of experiments to investigate the repulsive force between electrical bodies. He observes that when two threads are suspended near an electrified glass tube, they repel each other. The author also notes that the repulsive force is not solely due to the vibration of the tube's parts, as silk and thread exhibit different behaviors in response to the electrical effluvia.
